name: Ninja Tatakae (4 player Battle Game)
description:
4Player Local Action

Ninjas meet in a battle to the Death. Clash your Swords, throw deadly Shurikens, use bombs, or invoque elementals powers!!!  

Battle in the Rooftops of Neo Tokyo and in the Sakura Mountains. Show your skills to your friends, and be the last Ninja alive.

Play with up to 4 friends in this local multiplayer couch battle game. 


Slash your foes in two, use your Shurikens or Bombs to be the last Ninja alive.

Invoque unique Ninja Powers from the elements

Features
  • 4 Different ninjas to choose, with their own unique power
  • Battle in the rooftops of NeoTokyo, or the forest at the top of the hidden Sakura Mountains
  • Shurikens and Bombs to kill your opponents
  • 4 Hard Rock tracks
Roadmap

This game is in early access, with your purchase you get to own the game and get entitled to all future releases. The roadmap includes:

  • 2 New Characters
  • The Forest
  • Environmental Traps
  • Ability to dissapear
  • New Ninja weapons (smoke bombs, darts, Caltrops)
